question: Have super strength or have super speed?
Live in the future or the past?
Be able to fly or be invisible?
Only eat pizza or only eat burgers?
Never watch movies again or never listen to music again?
Have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
Be the smartest person or the funniest person?
Live on Mars or under the ocean?
Always be too hot or always be too cold?
Be a superhero or be a supervillain?
Be able to time travel or teleport anywhere instantly?
Only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?
Live in a mansion but be lonely or live in a small house with a lot of friends?
Be famous for a day or be unknown forever?
